subject: Fashion
title: Microtrend Cycle Acceleration
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Microtrend Cycle Acceleration.

hook.text: A TikTok trend can go from unknown to overexposed to dead in under three weeks.

buildup.text: Fashion trends once lasted 20 years. Then 10. Then 5. Now some barely survive a single month.

discovery.text: Social media algorithms reward novelty, spawning microtrends that peak and crash at record speed.

twist.text: Brands track viral content daily and can produce a knockoff garment in under a week.

climax.text: Each microtrend generates millions of garments that become unwearable the moment it dies.

punchline.text: Trends move at internet speed. Landfills pay the price.

quiz.question: What primarily drives the microtrend cycle in modern fashion?
options: Government fashion councils setting seasonal guidelines
Social media algorithms rewarding novelty, causing trends to peak and crash rapidly
Luxury designers accelerating their runway schedules
